name: Bifröst Blitz
description:
Welcome to Bifröst Blitz!

Attempt to ascend the Bifröst while dodging Heimdall's attacks from above, making sure you move to the beat!

Use A and D or the left and right arrow keys to move, try to get the highest score you can!

Made for the Playmakers Mythology Game Jam! I chose the sub-themes upward and turn-based!
